article_title: Impact of Trade Tariffs on Global Economy
article_content: Recent trade tariffs have significantly impacted global supply chains, consumer prices, and international trade relationships. While some domestic industries benefit from protection, the broader economic effects remain complex and far-reaching.

impacts.impact: Increased protection from foreign competition and potential market share growth

supporting_evidence.description: Reduced competition from imported goods due to higher prices
Potential for increased domestic production and employment

impacts.impact: Higher prices for imported goods and limited product choices

supporting_evidence.description: Increased costs passed on to consumers through higher retail prices
Reduced variety of available products in the market

impacts.impact: Disruption of established trade patterns and increased operational costs

supporting_evidence.description: Companies forced to restructure supply chains to avoid tariffs
Increased complexity and costs in international trade operations

impacts.impact: Strained trade relationships and potential trade wars

supporting_evidence.description: Increased political tensions between trading nations
